role.descr: agent, entity causing some grouping, making an association
theme, thing being included in some group

example.name: autogen1
example.text: he buys stocks in conjunction with options to boost returns and protect against declines

example.name: autogen2
example.text: One group seeks to publish a U.S.-Soviet medical journal in conjunction with the U.S.S.R. Ministry of Health .
example.arg: to publish a U.S.-Soviet medical journal
with the U.S.S.R. Ministry of Health
